title: I  am missing 5 tokens pls help
body: Can you take my 15 rp for them or should i draw something?Thanks in advance!{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

replies.body: The Worlds MIssions aren't over yet!  If you find yourself a bit short, wait until after the event is over and reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your specific issue.  I can't make any guarantees for you, but we like to look at each case individually and will see if we can do anything.
Yes they are over.I completed every single one.
